title: Holistic Language Education for Sustainability: Critical Thinking and Service-Learning Integration Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary education field experience or foundational knowledge of language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environment primarily using smartphones, offering continuous feedback via formative assessments. Aims to integrate sustainability values in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze sustainability-related texts and discuss their moral implications.
Learners can apply language skills to solving community problems by designing service-learning projects.
Learners can connect the meaning of sustainability education to their personal identity through self-reflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
